Mendokusai

Tartarus

DEFCON 2

24 Oct 2018

I have been grinding a bunch more DEFCON talks the past few days. Some of my favourites thusfar:

  • Cory Doctorow - Fighting Back in the War on General Purpose Computers
  • Chris Domas - Repsych: Psychological Warfare in Reverse Engineering
  • Van Albert and Banks - Looping Surveillance Cameras through Live Editing
  • Steven Danneman - Your Banks Digital Side Door
  • Garry Kasparov - The Brain's Last Stand
  • LosT - Hacker Fundamentals and Cutting Through Abstraction
  • Chris Rock - I Will Kill You
  • Robinson and Mitchell - Knocking my neighbors kids cruddy drone offline
  • Deviant Ollam & Howard Payne - Elevator Hacking - From the Pit to the Penthouse
